Package io.helidon.security.abac

Interface AbacValidatorConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolicyValidator.PolicyConfig, RoleValidator.RoleConfig, ScopeValidator.ScopesConfig, TimeValidator.TimeConfig

    public interface AbacValidatorConfig
    Marker interface for classes that define custom objects for attribute based access control (ABAC).
